title: Juice4Yu Organic Juice Bar
description: As of April 2014, the city's only organic juice bar. Features organic juices, 1, 2, and 3-day juice cleanses, natural fruit-based smoothies with almond milk or coconut water (no sugary concentrated juices). Also available are coffee and tea drinks. Situated in a zen-like lounge with free Wi-Fi inside Yoga4Yu Yoga Studio facing Staples,  between Target and The Pub north of Stonebriar Mall.
